## Quality summary

```{python}
#| echo: false
total_cells = 0
ok_cells = 0
good_cells = 0
na_cells = 0
for k, v in quality_summary["quality"].items():
  total_cells += v
  if k == "NA":
    na_cells += v
  if type(k) == int and k >= 0:
    ok_cells += v
  if k == 1:
    good_cells += v
n_features = quality_summary["n_rows"] 
n_formats = 11
all_cells = n_features * n_formats - na_cells
```

### Our coverage is at `{python} "%.2f%%" % (ok_cells / total_cells)`

* `{python} n_features` features 
* `{python} n_formats` formats
* `{python} all_cells` cells
* `{python} good_cells`/`{python} total_cells` good cells
* `{python} ok_cells`/`{python} total_cells` ok cells
